extendedInfo.description: Paradise City is a social city building game. You are the city planner! Use your imagination! Make your city like a paradise! Run your city together with your friends. Decorate the city with beautiful houses, gorgeous castles, towers, amusement parks, landmarks and cafes. Show your city to your friends!The game has global ranking. Build your dream paradise & put it in the world ranking!How to play: The game operation is simple. Select your items and place or re-arrange it in your desired place by touching and dragging. Collect the coins as soon as they are available. Features:- Choose from hundreds of varieties of items. - Extend your city area.- Increase or re-arrange your city roads.- Make your city more livable by placing amusement park, bank, hospital, stadium, cafes, factories etc.- Collect free "coin" as you continue building your city. Use coins to buy new items.- Use "cash" to buy exclusive items. Coming Soon:- Clean your friend's city. - Add your Avatar.
